pre_caption: This video is a brief scenery shot featuring an upward-panning camera movement. The scene begins with a low-angle view of a gravel soccer field with a goal. As the camera rises, it reveals a line of trees, a street with parked cars, apartment buildings, and distant mountains under a partly cloudy sky.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
